Thunder Token Inc/Blockchain Consensus Engineer/Full Time/Sunnyvale, CA

Responsibilities: Work with the research team to design and implement the Thunder consensus protocol. Delivering products with top notch quality in a fast-paced environment

Required: Minimum 5+ years of experience with large-scale distributed systems Ability to read and understand blockchain consensus related papers. Familiarity with version control software, such as Git Highly proficient in Object Oriented Design and Development

Highly Desired: Extensive experience with AWS or other cloud offerings a plus Strong development skills in Go Having a background or any prior experience in Crypto

Please email your CV and job title directly to hr@thundertoken.com for considerations
